io.neba.core.resourcemodels.registration

Class ModelRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.neba.core.resourcemodels.registration.ModelRegistry

  • @Service
public class ModelRegistry
extends Object
    Contains model sources associated to mappable types and the corresponding logic to lookup these relationships.
    Author:
    Olaf Otto

        public ModelRegistry()

    • Method Detail

      • lookupMostSpecificModels

        public Collection<LookupResult> lookupMostSpecificModels(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                                                String beanName)
        Finds the most specific models for the given Resource. The model's bean name must match the provided bean name.
        Parameters:
        resource - must not be null.
        beanName - must not be null.
        Returns:
        the resolved models, or null if no such models exist.

      • lookupMostSpecificModels

        public Collection<LookupResult> lookupMostSpecificModels(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Finds the most specific models for the given Resource, i.e. the first model(s) found when traversing the resource's mappable hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        resource - must not be null.
        Returns:
        the model sources, or null if no models exist for the resource.

      • lookupAllModels

        public Collection<LookupResult> lookupAllModels(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Finds the all models for the given Resource, i.e. the all model(s) found when traversing the resource's mappable hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        resource - must not be null.
        Returns:
        the model sources, or null if no models exist for the resource.

      • lookupMostSpecificModels

        public Collection<LookupResult> lookupMostSpecificModels(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                                                Class<?> targetType)
        Finds the most specific models for the given resource which are assignable to the target type.
        Parameters:
        resource - must not be null.
        targetType - must not be null.
        Returns:
        the sources of the models, or null if no such model exists.

      • shutdown

        @PreDestroy
public void shutdown()
        Clears the registry upon shutdown.

      • removeResourceModels

        public void removeResourceModels(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
        Removes all resource models originating from the given bundle from this registry.
        Parameters:
        bundle - must not be null.

      • getBeanSources

        public List<OsgiBeanSource<?>> getBeanSources()
        Returns:
        a shallow copy of all registered sources for models, never null but rather an empty list.

      • add

        public void add(String[] types,
       OsgiBeanSource<?> source)
        Adds the type[] -&t; model relationship to the registry.
        Parameters:
        types - must not be null.
        source - must not be null.

      • getTypeMappings

        public Map<String,Collection<OsgiBeanSource<?>>> getTypeMappings()
        Returns:
        all type -> model mappings.

      • removeInvalidReferences

        @Scheduled(fixedRate=30000L)
public void removeInvalidReferences()
        Checks whether the sources of all resource models are still valid. If not, the corresponding model(s) are removed from the registry.
